TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HyperLinkColumn extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: 控制項的資料行型別，包含資料行內每個項目的超連結。

span.span: A column type for the control that contains a hyperlink for each item in the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的資料行類型控制項來建立每個資料列中的超連結。Use the column type in a control to create a hyperlink for each row in the . 設定屬性來指定超連結的標題文字。Set the property to specify the caption text for the hyperlink. 指定要在按下超連結時，連結至 URL，請設定屬性。To specify the URL to link to when the hyperlink is clicked, set the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定和屬性，資料行中所有超連結會共用相同的標題和 URL。If you set the and properties, all hyperlinks in the column will share the same caption and URL. 您也可以繫結中的超連結的 URL 與文字標題至資料來源，而不是設定中的欄位和屬性。You can also bind the text caption and URL of the hyperlinks in the to a field in a data source instead of setting the and properties. 這可讓您顯示不同的標題，並指定資料行中的每個超連結不同的 URL。This allows you to display a different caption and to specify a different URL for each hyperlink in the column. 使用屬性來指定要繫結至資料行中的超連結文字標題的資料來源中的欄位。Use the property to specify a field in a data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in the column. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性不能同時設定相同的時間。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果已設定這兩個屬性，屬性會優先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 指定要繫結至超連結的 URL，藉由設定欄位屬性。Specify the field to bind to the URL of the hyperlink by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性不能同時設定相同的時間。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果已設定這兩個屬性，屬性會優先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 屬性可讓您指定的視窗或框架，以顯示網頁內容在按下超連結時，連結至。The property allows you to specify the window or frame to display the Web page content linked to when the hyperlink is clicked. 當使用資料繫結時，您可以藉由設定格式化的文字標題和超連結的 URL和屬性，分別。When using data binding, you can format the text caption and URL of the hyperlink by setting the and properties, respectively. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立連結至另一個頁面。The following example demonstrates how to create a that links to a separate page. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/CS/hyperlinkcolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/VB/hyperlinkcolumnvb.aspx#1)] 下列對應的範例會顯示在上述範例中所選取的項目。The following corresponding example displays the item selected in the previous example. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnDetails/CS/detailspagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnDetails/VB/detailspagevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridCtor/CS/datagridctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridCtor/VB/datagridctorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataNavigateUrlField { get; set; }
.property instance string DataNavigateUrlField
Public Overridable Property DataNavigateUrlField As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataNavigateUrlField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資料來源的欄位，以繫結至 內超連結的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the field from a data source to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the .

value.span: 資料來源的欄位，要繫結至 內超連結的 URL。

span.span: The field from a data source to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定從資料來源繫結至的 URL 中的超連結欄位。Use the property to specify the field from a data source to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the . 當 URL 為繫結至欄位的資料時，每個資料行中的超連結的 URL 設定對應值與指定之欄位中。When the URL is data bound to a field, the URL of each hyperlink in the column is set with a corresponding value in the specified field. 這可讓您設定資料行中的每個超連結不同的 URL。This allows you to set a different URL for each hyperlink in the column. 若要指定資料行中的每個資料列相同的 URL，設定而不是這個屬性的屬性。To specify the same URL for each row in the column, set the property instead of this property. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性不能同時設定相同的時間。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果已設定這兩個屬性，屬性會優先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 當您使用資料繫結時，您可以藉由設定的超連結 URL 的指定自訂的顯示格式屬性。When you are using data binding, you can specify a custom display format for the URL of the hyperlinks by setting the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性以指定要繫結中的超連結 URL 的資料來源中的欄位。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the field in a data source to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the . > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/CS/hyperlinkcolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/VB/hyperlinkcolumnvb.aspx#1)] 下列對應的範例會顯示在上述範例中所選取的項目。The following corresponding example displays the item selected in the previous example. Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Description("The formatting applied to the value bound to the NavigateUrl property.")

summary.span: 取得或設定當 URL 資料繫結至資料來源內的欄位時， 內超連結的 URL 的顯示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display format for the URL of the hyperlinks in the when the URL is data-bound to a field in a data source.

value.span: 字串，指定當 URL 資料繫結至資料來源內的欄位時， 內超連結的 URL 的顯示格式。

span.span: The string that specifies the display format for the URL of the hyperlinks in the when the URL is data-bound to a field in a data source.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性以提供自訂的顯示格式中的超連結 url 。Use the property to provide a custom display format for the URL of the hyperlinks in the . 指定的格式只會套用至的 URL，當 URL 為資料繫結至資料來源中的欄位。The specified format is only applied to the URL when the URL is data-bound to a field in a data source. 指定要設定的繫結至資料行中的超連結 URL 的欄位屬性。Specify the field to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the column by setting the property. 格式字串的語法資訊，請參閱。For information on the syntax of formatting strings, see . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來格式化資料繫結中的超連結。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to format the data-bound hyperlinks in the . > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/CS/hyperlinkcolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/VB/hyperlinkcolumnvb.aspx#1)] 下列對應的範例會顯示在上述範例中所選取的項目。The following corresponding example displays the item selected in the previous example. summary.span: 取得或設定資料來源的欄位，以繫結至 內超連結的文字標題。

span.span: Gets or sets the field from a data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in the .

value.span: 資料來源的欄位名稱，要繫結至 內超連結的文字標題。

span.span: The field name from a data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要繫結中的超連結的文字標題的資料來源的欄位名稱。Use the property to specify the field name from a data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in . 資料繫結至欄位的文字標題時，每個資料行中的超連結的文字標題設定對應值與指定之欄位中。When the text caption is data bound to a field, the text caption of each hyperlink in the column is set with a corresponding value in the specified field. 這可讓您設定資料行中的每個超連結不同的文字標題。This allows you to set a different text caption for each hyperlink in the column. 若要指定每個資料列相同的文字標題資料行中，設定而不是這個屬性的屬性。To specify the same text caption for each row in the column, set the property instead of this property. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性不能同時設定相同的時間。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果已設定這兩個屬性，屬性會優先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 當您使用資料繫結，您可以指定自訂的顯示格式的超連結文字標題設定屬性。When you using data binding, you can specify a custom display format for the text caption of the hyperlinks by setting the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性以指定要繫結中的超連結的文字標題的資料來源中的欄位。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the field in the data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in the . > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 取得或設定 資料行中超連結文字標題的顯示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display format for the text caption of the hyperlinks in the column.

value.span: 字串，指定資料行內超連結文字標題的顯示格式。

span.span: The string that specifies the display format for the text caption of the hyperlinks in the column.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性以提供自訂的顯示格式中的超連結文字標題。Use the property to provide a custom display format for the text caption of the hyperlinks in the . 指定的格式會套用至文字標題時，才文字標題資料繫結到資料來源中的欄位。The specified format is applied to the text caption only when the text caption is data bound to a field in a data source. 指定要設定繫結至資料行中的超連結文字標題欄位屬性。Specify the field to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in the column by setting the property. 格式字串的語法資訊，請參閱。For information on the syntax of formatting strings, see . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用中的格式化資料繫結文字屬性隱藏式字幕。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to format the data-bound text captions in the . > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual string FormatDataNavigateUrlValue (object dataUrlValue);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance string FormatDataNavigateUrlValue(object dataUrlValue) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function FormatDataNavigateUrlValue (dataUrlValue As Object) As String
protected: virtual System::String ^ FormatDataNavigateUrlValue(System::Object ^ dataUrlValue);

param.name: dataUrlValue
param.span: 要格式化的資料繫結的 URL。

span.span: The data-bound URL to format.

summary.span: 使用 屬性所指定的格式，格式化資料繫結的 URL。

span.span: Formats a data-bound URL using the format specified by the property.

returns.span: 資料繫結的 URL，其格式由 屬性所指定。

span.span: The data-bound URL in the format specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來格式化資料繫結 URL 值所指定的格式與屬性。Use the method to format a data-bound URL value with the format specified by the property. ## Examples > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumn2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumn2/CS/hypertextcolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumn2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumn2/VB/hypertextcolumnvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumn2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumn2/CS/hypertextcolumncs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumn2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumn2/VB/hypertextcolumnvb.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnDetailsPage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnDetailsPage/CS/detailspagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnDetailsPage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnDetailsPage/VB/detailspagevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnDetailsPage#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnDetailsPage/CS/detailspagecs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnDetailsPage#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnDetailsPage/VB/detailspagevb.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 使用 屬性指定的格式，格式化資料繫結的文字標題。

span.span: Formats a data-bound text caption using the format specified by the property.

returns.span: 資料繫結的文字標題，其格式由 屬性所指定。

span.span: The data-bound text caption in the format specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來格式化資料繫結文字標題值與所指定的格式屬性。Use the method to format a data-bound text caption value with the format specified by the property.

summary.span: 提供基底實作，將衍生自 類別的資料行重設為其初始的狀態。

span.span: Provides the base implementation to reset a column derived from the class to its initial state.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void InitializeCell (System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell cell, int columnIndex, System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType itemType);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void InitializeCell(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell cell, int32 columnIndex, valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType itemType) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub InitializeCell (cell As TableCell, columnIndex As Integer, itemType As ListItemType)

span.span: The cell to be initialized.

param.name: columnIndex
param.span: 包含儲存格的資料列之索引。

span.span: The index of the column that contains the cell.

param.name: itemType
param.span: 儲存格屬於其中一部分之項目的型別。

span.span: The type of item that the cell is part of.

summary.span: 使用內含的超連結，初始化表示此資料行的儲存格。

span.span: Initializes the cell representing this column with the contained hyperlink.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超連結會建立在資料格中的頁首和頁尾的項目以外的所有項目。HyperLinks are created for all items in the DataGrid except the Header and Footer items.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string NavigateUrl { get; set; }
.property instance string NavigateUrl
Public Overridable Property NavigateUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ NavigateUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定按一下資料行內超連結時所要連結的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to link to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked.

value.span: 按一下資料行內超連結時所要連結的 URL。

span.span: The URL to link to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用按一下屬性，指定資料行中的超連結時，連結至 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to link to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 當設定這個屬性時，資料行中的所有超連結會共用相同的 URL 連結。When this property is set, all hyperlinks in the column share the same URL link. 若要針對每個資料行中的超連結提供不同的 URL，使用屬性。To provide a separate URL for each hyperlink in the column, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性不能同時設定相同的時間。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果已設定這兩個屬性，屬性會優先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要連結中的超連結 URL 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the URL to link to for hyperlinks in the . 請注意，資料行中的所有超連結連結至相同的頁面。Notice that all hyperlinks in the column link to the same page. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnSingle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingle/CS/hyperlinkcolumnsinglecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnSingle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingle/VB/hyperlinkcolumnsinglevb.aspx#1)] 下列對應的範例是在按下前一個範例中的超連結時，連結至範例 Web Form 頁面。The following corresponding example is a sample Web Forms page to link to when a hyperlink in the previous example is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails/CS/detailspagesinglecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails/VB/detailspagesinglevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Target { get; set; }
.property instance string Target
Public Overridable Property Target As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目標視窗或框架 (Frame)，以顯示按一下資料行內超連結時所要連結的 Web 網頁內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame to display the Web page content that is linked to when the hyperlink in the column is clicked.

value.span: 目標視窗或框架，以載入當按一下資料行內超連結時所要連結的 Web 網頁。

span.span: The target window or frame to load the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，會重新整理擁有焦點的視窗或框架。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的框架或視窗顯示網頁連結至按一下資料行中的超連結時。Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked. 如果未設定這個屬性，在瀏覽器或具有焦點的視窗時重新整理按一下資料行中的超連結。If this property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when a hyperlink in the column is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 屬性轉譯成`target`屬性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`屬性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許項目。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 請勿設定屬性如果轉譯的輸出為必須 XHTML 1.1 相容。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱主題[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在建立可存取網頁時，強烈建議您避免使用指向另一個視窗中的屬性。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB: ASP.NET 網頁可及性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). 值必須以中範圍的 A 到 Z （不區分大小寫），除了下列的特殊值，其中以底線開頭字母為開頭。The value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore. |目標值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|在無框架的新視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|在即時父代框架組中呈現內容。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜尋窗格中呈現內容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|在擁有焦點 (Focus) 的框架中呈現內容。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|在無框架的完整視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 請查閱您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否支援 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Internet Explorer 5.0 和更新版本支援`_search`目標值。For example, Internet Explorer 5.0 and above support the `_search` target value. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要顯示的網頁內容的視窗連結至按一下資料行中的超連結時。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the window to display the contents of the Web page linked to when the hyperlink in the column is clicked. 此範例會在新視窗中顯示連結的 Web 網頁。This example displays the linked Web page in a new window. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/CS/hyperlinkcolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/VB/hyperlinkcolumnvb.aspx#1)] 下列對應的範例會顯示在上述範例中所選取的項目。The following corresponding example displays the item selected in the previous example. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnDetails/CS/detailspagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnDetails/VB/detailspagevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Text { get; set; }
.property instance string Text
Public Overridable Property Text As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資料行內超連結所要顯示的文字標題。

span.span: Gets or sets the text caption to display for the hyperlinks in the column.

value.span: 資料行內超連結的文字標題。

span.span: The text caption for the hyperlinks in the column.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要針對資料行中的超連結顯示的文字標題。Use the property to specify the text caption to display for the hyperlinks in the column. > [!NOTE] > 當設定這個屬性時，資料行中的所有超連結會共用相同的文字標題。When this property is set, all hyperlinks in the column share the same text caption. 若要為每個資料行中的超連結中提供個別的文字標題，請使用屬性。To provide a separate text caption for each hyperlink in the column, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性不能同時設定相同的時間。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果已設定這兩個屬性，屬性會優先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the . 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果此資料行的值是來自使用者輸入，請務必驗證的值，以減少安全性弱點。If the values for this column come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定中的超連結的文字標題。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text caption for hyperlinks in the . 請注意，所有資料行中的超連結會有相同的文字標題。Notice that all hyperlinks in the column have the same text caption. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnSingle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingle/CS/hyperlinkcolumnsinglecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnSingle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingle/VB/hyperlinkcolumnsinglevb.aspx#1)] 下列對應的範例是在按下前一個範例中的超連結時，連結至範例 Web Form 頁面。The following corresponding example is a sample Web Forms page to link to when a hyperlink in the previous example is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails/CS/detailspagesinglecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails/VB/detailspagesinglevb.aspx#1)]
